resources.string: We couldn\'t find any open restaurants matching your parameters. Please try again later.
We failed to find any restaurant suggestions for you. Please try again later.

Hey, it looks like you\'re a frequent user of Food Button! If you have a couple seconds, I would be incredibly grateful if you could rate this app in the Play Store. Don\'t worry, I won\'t bother you with this ever again no matter what you choose. Thank you again for even downloading this app to begin with.
Your current location has been set.
Your current location is where the Food Button searches for restaurants.
We are unable to get your current location right now. Please use the map button in the toolbar to explicitly set a location and try again.
Your current location is currently set to \"Automatic\", which means that you need to enable location services to allow Food Button to get it. Would you like to do that now?
